Turn Up & Transform Futures: Your Festival Ticket Fuels HBCU Scholarships!
/$
$
OCEANS OF SOUL
JAZZ FESTIVAL
/$
$
December 6-7
Fort Lauderdale Beach Park
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Blog Post
/$
/$
$
The soulful rhythms of Southern Soul are rising — and the Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival is right at the heart of this musical revival.
Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival
Navigating the Value of Concerts and Festivals: Is Price a Deciding Factor in Today’s Economic Landscape?
Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival
Embrace the Vinyl Journey: Your Guide to Vinyl Records
Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival
1
2
/$
/$
$
Blog Post
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Celebrating Music, Community, and Culture
/$
$
Through the soulful melodies and rhythmic beats, music connects us, inspiring a sense of community and uplifting our spirits.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
$
Dec 5th
/$
$
VIP Yacht Party
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Dec 6th
/$
$
Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival
Day One
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Dec 7th
/$
$
Oceans of Soul Jazz Festival
Day Two
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Soulful Escape
/$
/$
$
$
$
Art Avenue
/$
$
$
/$
$
Art Avenue transforms the park into an open-air gallery, featuring the works of 200 invited artists. From vibrant paintings and intricate sculptures to captivating photography.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Oceans VIP Club
/$
$
$
/$
$
Experience ultimate luxury at the Oceans VIP Club, where music, culture, and cuisine come together with exclusive perks, premium seating, and unforgettable waterfront views.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Podcast Stage
/$
$
$
/$
$
Dive deep into the heart of soul music with the Oceans of Soul Podcast Stage, where legendary artists and rising stars share their stories and music.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Building Wealth and Financial Security.
/$
$
$
/$
$
Presentations from experienced financial advisors, covering topics such as investment strategies, wealth management, and financial planning.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Oceans of Flavor
/$
$
$
/$
$
Tantalize your taste buds with a diverse selection of culinary delights.
Local and international vendors will offer a fusion of flavors.
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Festival Kick Off Yacht Party
/$
$
$
/$
$
This is the exclusive prelude, a taste of the refined elegance that defines "Oceans of Soul."
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Prepare for a symphony of sensations. This is your exclusive invitation to a weekend where music, culture, and the ocean collide. RSVP to join the movement.
/$
$
BOGO SALE

Looking Ahead:
/$

Oceans of Soul
Schedule 2025
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
[1]
/$
$
Saturday, December 6th, 2025
/$
$
11:00 AM - 10:00 PM:
Oceans of Flavor - Food Village (Fort Lauderdale Beach Park): Diverse culinary offerings from local and international vendors, highlighting seafood and soul food.
Beer Garden - Local Breweries (Fort Lauderdale Beach Park): Selection of craft beers from South Florida breweries.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
[2]
/$
$
Sunday, December 7th, 2025
/$
$
7:00 PM - 10:00 PM: Main Stage Concert (Fort Lauderdale Beach Park): Headlining performances by renowned jazz and soul artists.​
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
[3]
/$
$
Saturday, December 6th, 2025
/$
$
12:00 PM - 8:00 PM: Podcast Stage & Beach Party (Fort Lauderdale Beach Park): Beachside entertainment with DJ sets, games, and interactive activities.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
[4]
/$
$
Sunday, December 7th, 2025
/$
$
11:00 AM - 2:00 PM: Gospel Sunday Main Stage (Fort Lauderdale Beach Park): Uplifting gospel music performances.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Last But Not Least: Fun Moments
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
$
/$
$
We believe in the power of education.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Join us for a weekend of pure musical magic.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Where the rhythm of the waves meets the soul of the music.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Community, culture, and unforgettable sounds.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Dive into a world of art, culture, and culinary delights.
